documents.document:
What A Day!

ok well it started by my mom callin me a 10:00 in the morin and sain that i needed to get ready for the doctor well i did and she called again and said that i didnt have to be there until 1:45...so i still could of still be sleepin....so i did ALL of my home work b/c i was bored and there was alot of it to be done....sence my homebound teacher hasnt came out here AT ALL! so anyways i get to the doc. and they were running like 1 hour behind so i sit...sit...sit...sit...and finally i get to see the doc. well she unwraps my foot and then she like asked me what color and i said green and like then she wraped it again....so i was only there just for her to wrap my foot which i could have done that! and then she tells me i STILL cant go to school so i was really man...b/c i HATE sittin at home bein bored!....then i get home and foot is hurtin from walkin on it and i duno!....but im gettin off!....peace!

Bad Day!

well...today i found out one of my BEST friends is moving back! and i cant even say bye to him! he was the the best person to be around and i had the most fun with him! well i'm out! *Tj i LOVE you!*

Upset

well lets see....last night i stayed the night with jade....and i went to sleep like really early...then tonight Matt Henson came over at like 9 and he didnt leave til like now...at 2 in the morin well....he told me he is goin back where he lives and that is like 2 hours away and i'm kinda upset!...i think i like him but i dont know....well wait...i do like him...ALOT....and well i dunno but...earlier jade called me and told me the Tj made it to South Dakota okay so that is good!....but anyways...i'm out!* peace!

Worried

ok well...Matt left at like 5 in the morin and like i dunno if he has made it to his house b/c i havent heard from him AT ALL and i'm like really worried!.....i just hopes he is there and like is sleepin or something....then just like 20 minutes ago...i get a damn virus on my msn thing...so like yeah i'm pissed....but i think i'm gonna go to bed!...peace!

Matt Babe I Love You!

umm..

ok well i just found out that Matt made it down there okay...and like we are kinda like not talkin right now but i dunno...okay today i get this damn virus and like my mom had to go in a like delete everything so she got pissed at me...then now i'm waiting for my msn 7.5 to redownload and like it is takin forever! but...i dunno...then last night jade and i are like kinda i guess "not talkin"...b/c she wont answer my phone calls or anything....so...but i'm about to go crazy b/c me and Matt arnt talkin!....so im gonna talk to him...i'm out!* peace!

boring.....

well today was nothin but a waste....all i did was sit around and did nothin....but yeah...me and Matt are still not talkin and like i'm kinda upset...but ill get over it....i think but i think i'm gonna go...i'm really tired dunno why but i'm out* peace!

tonight

tonight my brother was bein an asshole and he wouldnt let me get on MY computer.....so like i fought with him for like 2 hours...so finally he let me and the person i wanted to talk to wasnt even on so like it kinda pissed me off....but... well tomorrow i gotta go to the doc to see if i can get my stiches out or not...and see if i can go back to school sence she said i couldnt go....i'm finally gona go and take my test for my permit too!...im kinda scared....then me and my mom are gonna go shoppin!...cant wait!....yeah i'm just a busy girl huh? ... MSN is nothin but DRAMA...it pisses me off!...oh wait i think its just the people!....but any ways....i think i'm gonna go....long day tomorrow!....peace*

umm...

well today i like woke up at like umm lets see....like 2! and then my dog started barkin so i thought someone was here and it kinda scared me...but well i looked outside and like no one was there so i duno...but yeah...tomorrow i get to go back to school and i'm soo happy!...and my mom is like kinda like umm "y dont u wait til Monday so its not snowing" or some shit like that.... but i really wanna go back!....and i guess she dont get it!...lol...but yesterday i went to the doc and like i passed out b/c she like made me look at my foot and it was gross....and when she was takin out the damn stiches she had to pull em b/c they were stuck in my skin then they like took like a book full of x-rays and that like really hurt b/c i had to put my foot on the floor and i had to walk on it! but i'm gonna go...talk later...peace*

about time!

ok well tonight Matt and I finally started talkin again!...and like he was never mad at me in the first place! so i was like really happy... well he is comin up for Christmas and like i'm really glad! but...tomorrow i gotta change my like cast thing for my foot and like its gonna be gross....ill like have my mom do it for me or something... b/c ill get sick again....but...i think i'm gonna go to bed cuz i gotta get up at 4:30 to get ready for school...so i'm out. peace*

well this weekend was GREAT!

ok well last night(saturday night) i stayed the night with one of my guy friends, with jade, hannah,tausha,chris and of course Randy! and like i dunno cant really remember but all i know is there was a shit load of people there!....and like then in the morin Brandon and Ian came over and umm like all the girls had to clean his house b/c "we trashed it" lol...but we didnt... well...maybe...well i had to make the bed and i have NEVER made a bed before...so like i had hannah do it for me...then i had to vacumn but i didnt really do that to good either so hannah did that too....then i did the dishes and i knew how to do that....well after the house was cleaned umm yeah...i dunno? lol then we sat there and like did nothin...then everyone left well...it was just Randy, Ian, Jade, and me there....so... but i'm goin to go i'm tired!....peace*

DAD!!!!!!!

well last night i was sittin at my computer and like it was like 12 something in the morin....well my hear this knockin at my door and my dog started barkin so i like got scared and like took off runnin down my hallway....into my mom and dad's room well then i started yellin at my dad to get up and he was like whats wrong? and i told him someone was at the door so he jumps up and runs to the door and like no one was there....so i kinda felt stupid but then we saw footprints in the lil bit of ice we still have in the backyard so there was someone out there...well then he turns all the lights on out side and like there was nothin.... well after they went to bed i kept seein this truck go by the house and like it kept stoppin like at the end of my driveway so i duno what they were doin? well then my mom just told me to stay home from school sence like i dunno...but i did...and i think i'm gonna go tomorrow b/c i'm suppose to be hangin out with my friend Jess...well i'm gonna go....peace*

OOPS!

well tonight i pissed my boyfriend off....then he started yellin at me b/c i wanted to hang out with one of my guy friends....but i won! then he pissed me off so i took off and left...but things are goin good for me so far but i'm gonna go! peace*

haha!

well i'm fuckin single again! finally! Shawn finally broke up with me....and i wasnt gonna break up with him b/c "he didnt want to get hurt" but then again he breaks up with me!...which was GREAT with me.... but anyways....today is my daddy's 40th birthday and like i'm makin fun of him b/c he is gettin old so i'm out! peace

PARTY TONIGHT!!

well its New Year's Eve and i'm ready to party!....i havent really got on this thing in a while so ill say whats been goin on....umm nothin really...other than i got my eyebrow pierced on the 29th Rando Pipkin's Birthday!! and then i got the flu umm yesterday the 30th and like i was feelin like shit all day!....but tonight i have this lil plan with some of my friends...and i think it will work out great!...well i hope it does....well alot of shit to do so im out for now!....peace*

well...

WoW!...i havent been on here sence New Year's Eve...long long time huh?...well yeah i dont really have time anymore now that i'm back in school...but anyways...umm i have been sick and it sucks ass!...and other than that....i'm doin good!... but i dont have much to say so i'm out!...peace*

Long Time No Talk!

Dang! last time i was on here was a while ago!...well nothin much as happend other than well not gonna say! but anyways sweetheart dance is coming up on the 17th and i'm really happy b/c i'm goin with my best friend in the fuckin world which is Jade! but anyways....i got a salmon color dress and its really pretty but....i duno i just cant wait for the dance!....well...there is not much to say so i'm out! peace*

So Soon!

well today is Feb. 14th and if my best friend was still alive he would have been 21 years old!... well Sweetheart Dance is coming up this coming Saturday and i'm really excited! One of my freinds came home from Texas or somewhere he was at Basic Trainning i think lol...then another friends of mine came down from Kansas to see his 'girlfriend' or what ever you want to call her...and i think he is gonna pick us up from the dance saturday and i'm glad to see him.....but i think i'm gonna go...peace*

WOW

holy shit...i havent been on here for ever! i cant even remember how to work this shit!...well i got a new boyfriend who is amazing and i really like him alot!...he is so awesome! i got a new puppy and i love it alot he is soo tiny and he is already mean!! well...dont know what else to say...i'm out! peace**
